name: Psycho Bounder
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Jinzo", or 1 Spell/Trap that specifically lists that name in its text, from your Deck to your hand. Before damage calculation, if another monster you control is attacked by an opponent's monster: You can destroy both the attacking monster and this card. You can only use each effect of "Psycho Bounder" once per turn.
